alert.note: Alert for Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Todd and southwestern Tripp Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Kilgore to 6 miles north of Sicangu Village to 2 miles southeast of Keyapaha. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lakeview around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Saint Francis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
